    android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback

    public class VerticalLinearRecyclerViewSample
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
    Sample Activity for the vertical linear RecyclerView sample. Uses ButterKnife to inject view resources.
    Since:
    5/27/2015
